resources.string: Sudoku: Fill the Sudoku grid by placing numbers 1 to 9 in each row, column, and 3x3 sub-grid without repetition.
Calculation: Solve the mathematical expressions by performing the required calculations.
Colors: Memorize the sequence of flashing colors and replicate it by pressing the corresponding buttons in the same order.
Grid: Watch for the cells that light up. After they flash, click the same cells to clear the grid.
Sequence: Identify the pattern and complete the arithmetic or geometric sequence with the correct number.
Number of: Count the objects shown in the image and provide the correct total.
Moving Sum: Calculate the sum of a series of moving numbers.
Descending: Arrange the items or images in descending order based on their appearance, including zero.
Cards: Find and match all the pairs of identical cards to complete the game.
Slider: Rearrange the puzzle by swapping two pieces at a time to restore the original image. You can use the default image or upload your own.
Stroop: Click the button that corresponds to the color of the text, ignoring the meaning of the word.
Roman Numerals: Match the Roman numerals to their equivalent Arabic numerals to form pairs.
